key.name: access-token
key.description: Acces key to Feedly-API. Will time out at some point.

key.name: refresh-token
key.description: Token to generate new access key to feedly-API.

key.name: api-code
key.description: Code to get access token for the first time. Gets returned after logging in via google/facebook.

key.name: email
key.description: Email address of the current user.
